description: This Mexican salad will be ready in a flash! Crunchy and flavourful, it's the best salad recipe for a quick lunch or light dinner.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Jan Feb 2021,Summer,Peanut free
name: Chopped Mexican Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 tsp Mexican chilli powder, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Place sour cream, lime juice and chilli powder in a small bowl, then stir to combine. Season and set aside until ready to serve.
Place lettuce, coriander, capsicum, avocado and jalapeno on a large chopping board. Roughly chop into bite-sized pieces. Add corn and beans and toss to combine.
Arrange salad on a large platter and top with a few roughly broken corn chips. Dollop over dressing, sprinkled with extra chilli powder, and serve with remaining corn chips.
